summary: Three young women from very different walks of life join the women's land army during World War II and are sent to work together on a farm in Dorset and the experience changes their lives forever.
cast: Catherine McCormack|Rachel Weisz|Anna Friel|Steven Mackintosh|Tom Georgeson|Maureen O'Brien|Lucy Akhurst|Gerald Down|Paul Bettany|Nick Mollo|Michael Mantas|Nicholas Le Prevost|Celia Bannerman|Ann Bell|Nigel Planer|Edmund Moriarty|Shirley Newbery|Russell Barr|John Gill|Crispin Layfield|Grace Leland|Alan Bennett|Martha Mackintosh|Felix Davis|Jacob Leland|Arnold Brown|Esther Hall|Charlie Higson|Kate Lock|Richard Stevens|Daniel Tee
keywords: united kingdom|great britain|young woman|falling in love|friendship between women
title: Amores en tiempos de guerra
